rules.summary: The T allele at rs12934922 has been associated with reduced conversion of beta-carotene to vitamin A in some studies.
CC at rs12934922 is not associated with the reduced conversion reported for the T allele.
The T allele at rs7501331 has been associated with reduced beta-carotene conversion efficiency in some studies.
CC at rs7501331 is not associated with the reduced conversion reported for the T allele.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for BCMO1 markers.
suggestion: Vitamin A status depends on diet; consider discussing nutrition choices with a clinician or dietitian. This is not medical advice.

evidence_level.summary: Associations exist but effects are modest and vary by study.

limitations: This is not a measure of vitamin A status and does not replace lab testing.
references: BCMO1 variants and beta-carotene conversion studies (PubMed)
